snippet: A criminal court judge in Manhattan has ruled that Twitter must relinquish to prosecutors messages that were sent out by a Brooklyn writer during the Occupy Wall Street protests.
abstract: A criminal court judge in Manhattan has ruled that Twitter must relinquish to prosecutors messages that were sent out by a Brooklyn writer during the Occupy Wall Street protests.

headline.main: Judge Orders Twitter to Release Protester's Messages
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Twitter to Turn Over Protester’s Messages
